name: A Battle Classic Aircraft Fighter :Space Explosion
name_original: A Battle Classic Aircraft Fighter :Space Explosion
description:
This is the most exciting space game of the space fighter. Just control the aircraft to dodge enemy and try to maintain energy to fly as long as possible. There are items to collect as a weapon to attack the enemy. How long can you fly? Come test your capability, speed and reaction!!!

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the aircraft to dodge enemy
- Maintain energy to fly as long as possible
- Collect items to increase your abilities.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Beautiful aircraft and scenes
- Exciting sounds and effects
- Upgrade character
